data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Ling, Liu, Hao-Yu (2017): A new species of the genus Comidoblemmus Storozhenko & Paik (Orthoptera: Gryllidae) from Xizang, China. Zootaxa 4294 (1): 137-140, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.1.10|1 occurrence
